Text.Page: General Samael taught you how to use glyphs as a reward for your achievements in the Celestial Hills.
Take this to Dougal in Velika. Tell him I sent you. Please hurry.

It's rare to see such glowing words written in Mattin's hand. You certainly impressed him, .

Deliver this little epistle to Samael. He's as hard to win over as Mattin, but if anything can do it, this report can.

Well done, . This is exactly the kind of action we need from our soldiers right now.

Hmm. Well, this is quite a report. I guess you're not the keener I expected. I underestimated you. I promise I won't do that in the future.

We need more than just soldiers, we need leaders. Dougal thinks you're ready for a commission. I'm hardly going to argue against it, not after deeds such as these. Come, it's not every day you get to be a hero.
Do you have something to report?

! What took you so long?

let's start the ceremony.

Now, as an officer, you should learn how to use glyphs.

Glyphs have different powers according to the classes. Glyphs will grant additional power to your skills.
